filesets.filesettext:
FileSet {
  Name = "SelfTest"
  Description = "fileset just to backup some files for selftest"
  Include {
    Options {
      Signature = "XXH128"
      AclSupport = Yes
      XattrSupport = Yes
      FsType = "ext2"
      FsType = "ext3"
      FsType = "ext4"
      FsType = "overlay"
      FsType = "jfs"
      FsType = "ufs"
      FsType = "xfs"
      FsType = "zfs"
      FsType = "btrfs"
      FsType = "vfat"
    }
    File = "\</home/alaa/bareosprojects/build-bareos/systemtests/tests/bareos-basic/tmp/file-list"
  }
}
